name: VoucherVault
description: VoucherVault is a Django web application to store and manage vouchers, coupons, loyalty and gift cards digitally. Features include transaction history tracking for gift cards, item-specific file uploads (images and PDFs), item sharing between users, QR code and barcode display for redeem codes, client-side code scanning with automatic type detection, expiry notifications via Apprise, multi-user support, multi-language support (English, German, French, Italian), Single Sign-On via OIDC, and database compatibility with SQLite3 and PostgreSQL.
author: l4rm4nd
